title: The playe called the foure PP. A newe and a very mery enterlude of A palmer. A pardoner. A potycary. A pedler. Made by Ioh[a]n Heewood
author: Heywood, John, 1497?-1580?
publisher: In Fletestrete at the sygne of the George by Wyllyam Myddylton,
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Some pages stained; some cropped at foot, affecting signatures.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
